resources.string:
Welcome to the @string/app_name, we will help you split each and every bill properly

We use facebook to get up to the speed. Press the "Sign-in" button to get started.

Choose a currency from the below list, your choice will be used as the default currency in all the transactions that you add.

However you are not limited by the currency you choose. You can modify the currency on per transaction basis if you like.
